Package algonquin.cst2335.finalproject.data

Class AirportAdapter

java.lang.Object
android.widget.BaseAdapter
algonquin.cst2335.finalproject.data.AirportAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter
public class AirportAdapter extends android.widget.BaseAdapter
This is a custom adapter class for displaying list of Airports.

      Get a View that displays the data at the specified position in the data set.
      Parameters:
      position - the position of the item within the adapter's data set.

      Returns:
